node.overview: With a simple silhouette and low profile, the Travolta Bed fits effortlessly into a millennial lifestyle. The trendy deep cushioned split headboard fuses form and function, inviting you to spend long hours as you sit, sleep, work and watch. The frame rests on yellow copper legs, anchoring this work of self assured style.

node.overview: The most striking feature of the Zarine bed is its headboard-wrapped in a beautiful fabric. Next, is the skillfully-designed arch-shaped footboard. In between these two, is the epitome of comfort. Need we say more?

node.dimension: WARDROBE : 271.1cm x 62cm x 225cm.
node.overview: With fine lines and angles, the Zarina wardrobe is the perfect blend of form and function. Shelves that ensure there is ample storage space make this a great way to keep your bedroom uncluttered. The subdued colours and the glossy finish mean that its the right fit for every bedroom.

node.dimension: WARDROBE : 271.1cm x 62cm x 225cm.
node.overview: With superior, plush fabrics that dress the headboard and the stool, and the subtly-designed footboard, the Zarina bed has all the markings of a heavenly retreat. Wrapped in luxurious material from top to toe, the bed is aesthetically pleasing.
